description: Aux Gouts du Jour is an association dedicated to improving eating habits among children and adults. Founded in 2006 by three agri-food engineering students, it aims to raise awareness about food through participatory workshops, training, and community events. The initiative focuses on understanding food's role in health, the environment, and social connections, offering diverse programs that engage various audiences, including schools, social workers, and the general public, to promote informed food choices.
name: Aux Gouts du Jour
